title: Rohnen - Champion Concept
body:
Champion Name: Rohnen
Pronunciation: (ROH-NEN)

Short Champion Summary:
Rohnen starts with his ultimate ability and cannot level it up, instead can invest an extra point into his first 3 abilities. Rohnen would be used as a support, mage or even a tank top lane. He would be hard to play but I think learning his mechanics would be fun.

Champions Statistics:

Base Health: 523 Health
Health Regeneration: 6.88 Health Regeneration per 5 Seconds
Positive Charges: 5 Maximum
Negative Charges:	 5 Maximum
Attack Damage: 54 Attack Damage
Attack Speed: 0.670 Attack Speed
Armor: 21 Armor
Magic Resistance:	 31.25 Magic Resistance
Movement Speed:	 330 Movement Speed


Champions Passive(s), and Ability(s):

**Passive:	**
Rohnen gains different abilities depending if he has more positive or negative charges. Rohnen can have a maximum of 10 charges, 5 positive and 5 negative charges. If Rohnen have the same amount of charges or the maximum amount of both charges, he depletes one of the negative charges on his next attack, dealing increased magic damage and stunning the target.
	
Magic Damage: 30/50/70/90 Magic Damage + (0.2 AP)
Stun duration: 1 Second

**Ability One: **
If Rohnen has more positive charges, he attracts all nearby allies, both gaining an increase in movement speed, decaying over 3 Seconds. If Rohnen has more negative charges, he attracts all nearby enemy champions, dealing magic damage and slowing them for a short period of time.
	
Increased Movement Speed: 25/35/45/55/65/75% Increased Movement Speed
Slow Amount: 25/30/35/40/45/50% Slow Amount
Slow Duration: 1.5 Seconds
Magic Damage: 70/90/110/130/150/170 Magic Damage + (0.4 AP)
Charge Cost: 2 Charges
Cool Down: 10/10/9/9/8/8 Seconds
Pull Range: 400 Units

**Ability Two:	**
If Rohnen has more positive charges, he grants himself and nearby allied champions a health shield. If Rohnen has more negative charges, he lunges forward dealing magic damage to all targets, If Rohnen can cast more than lunge, it's cool down is completely refreshed.
	
Shield Amount: 70/85/105/135/175/225 Health + (0.2 AP)
Magic Damage: 60/80/100/120/140/160 Magic Damage + (0.3 AP)
Lunge Range: 300/320/340/360/380/400 Units
Shield Range: 500 Units
Charge Cost: 2 Charges
Cool Down: 8/8/7/7/6/6 Seconds

**Ability Three:	**
Passively Rohnen gains increased magic damage on his auto attacks. If Rohnen has more positive charges he places a positive counter on the target. If Rohnen has more negative charges he places a negative counter on the target. Once the target reaches 3 charges, if they have more positive the target is stunned for a short period of time. If they have more negative the target takes increased magic damage.
	
Magic Damage (on AA): 15/25/35/45/55/65 Magic Damage + (0.06 AP)
Stun Duration: 1/1/1/1.5/1.5/1.5 Seconds
Increased Magic Damage: 40/60/80/100/120/140 Magic Damage + (0.2 AP)
Counter Cool Down: 5 Seconds

**Ultimate Ability:	**
For each nearby ally champion Rohnen passively gains a positive charge. For each nearby enemy champion Rohnen passively gains a negative charge. If Rohnen is by himself we will passively have a chance to gain a negative or positive charge. Rohnen can activate this ability to increase the amount of charges he gains drastically.
	
(I wanted there to be an interaction with nearby characters, like a lightning tether of some type, which would show you who you're gaining charges from)
	
Positive Charge: 1 Positive Charge per Ally per 3 Seconds
Negative Charge: 1 Negative Charge per Enemy per 3 Seconds
No Nearby Champions: 50% Chance
Increased Charges: 300%
Charge Range: 500 Units

Why I think this champion is unique:
There isn't any champion in league of legends which uses the resource system Rohnen has, or the interaction he has with enemies or ally champions. I think depending on your play style would depend how the abilities end up and I think he could be used very strategically.

replies.body:
Remove the chance from his ultimate, RNG is annoying. Also, his playstyle encourages unintelligent play. "Oh hey we outnumber them, but now all I have are buffs to keep us alive just in case they pull out a miracle." "We may be outnumbered, but I have a bunch of nukes so prepare to die from my 2v4 powers!"

And his passive, when he has even charges, how does he determine what abilities he has to attack with in the first place? I think it's be better for the system to be a 13 charge maximum, losing or gaining one charge means losing or gaining the other to keep the number at 13 total.

Make his negative charges increase escape ability while his positive charges increase chase ability.

Also, we have no clue how he looks like or what his lore is. I don't even know if he's a guy.

And finally, LoL always uses linear scaling. Cooldown should always be -1 , -1, -1 and not -0, -0, -1, -1 per rank. His scaling is also reaaaally bad in terms of ratios so I'd hardly recommend using him as a Mage. Soraka's has better ratios and brings more with a mid and not support build

i dont think RNG is annoying i know some people do; but i think it adds a chance to play differently. and i dont understand what you mean about the passive. i think its cool how you different charges depending on your positioning. but i cant understand the cds but with 6 points in each one i didnt want them to end up to low.

Abilities always give the same stats per rank, it's never an increase right in the middle and nowhere else.

RNG rarely ever does that... It only appears in crits which are core to ADCs, but rarely ever abilities. It tends to blur the line between skill and luck, unless it's an out of combat RNG, in which case it's just really annoying and your use encourages players to spam their low cooldown skills until they get lucky and get a lot of the charges they want while walking to lane or something
valid point. idk i play pokemon and its all about RNGS so i guess thats why i dont see the big deal in it

In League, champion design is typically based around comboing spells, and them working well together, in this kit I can't clearly see any type of fun combo anyone can do, possibly edit is so there is a combo somewhere in there to make him playable? All I see now is a bunch of cc abilities, however it'd be nice if there was just more synergy between his spells.

he literally has an ability which is perfect for wombo combos for 1. and he can lunge pull allies to safety. pull and lunge to bring people back and then stun them. he has combos. so idk what youre talking about. but synergy would have to come with practice with him.
